short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bigdef will help you to discover new words in different languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use BigDef to:
* gather foreign language words from any web pages across all internet
* study with flash cards
* improve your vocabulary
* compete compare your achievements with other users

Usage of the extension is very simple:
* open a page
* find a word
* select a word
* click the right button on your mouse and open context menu
* find the item in the menu "Show <the word> in BigDef"
* click on the item
* you will see a very deep definition of the word

Besides you can add a word to your word list to study it later with flashcards on our site.
Or you can mark the word as known if you know it.
